text.Node10:
I hope that doesn't sound boring to you.

It's honestly quite entertaining once you get into it, well... 
In MY opinion anyway. Take that for what it's worth I guess.
text.Node11:
Also... This is not a "funny" game.

This might seem funny, because you kinda caught me off guard, 
and I'm not used to this... 
But no, the game is not like that really. 

It's quite serious... oh and ADULT!
text.Node12:
I mean... It's not like an adult game or anything...

But it contains some pretty adult themes, 
and is not appropriate for children, 
so you know.... trigger warning and all that.
text.Node13:
Ok, that's about it. What else... No I think that's all...

No wait, I forgot...
text.Node14:
Nice to meet you.
My name is Thack.
text.Node2: You need to press Spacebar to continue.
text.Node3:
Nice! Ok, here we go. Welcome to the Game!
Wow! I never really thought anyone would actually play this...
text.Node31:
I want to tell you more, but, let's go to my room first.
Its the door on the left there.

And the only door that is going to work because... 
Well as I said... this is a tutorial.
text.Node4:
Damn, this is wrong... sorry.
I'm terrible at this.
text.Node5:
Ok... This is the tutorial for the game. 
Right... tutorial... lets do this!
text.Node6:
Ok, so you can move using the WASD keys, as you do in most games.

You can also use the movement keys... but I'm not sure why you would want to...
text.Node64:
Ok, so.. 
I'm an apprentice to Father Djonsicus here in the Church.
text.Node65:
I'm new here, but this village is... 
I don't actually remember the name of the Village.. 
Sorry. As I said, I'm new, I just arrived a few days ago actually.
text.Node66:
Anyway, there is not a lot of people in the village at the moment, 
most are away at some festival I believe. 
And I've mostly been doing chores and required reading.
text.Node7:
I don't know. Maybe you like using the movement keys instead of the WASD keys.

That's up to you.. I don't... it really has nothing to do with me.
You can use either, its fine... really.
text.Node8:
Ok, moving around, easy right?

Secondly the rest of the game... 
So this is an RPG, it really is.
But, its probably different from games you've played before.
text.Node9:
I mean. There is no combat here, this game is about... 
you know... dialogue... talking to people. 
Thinking about what they say, and so on...
